column2: "Iyi n’ekyir no Job buee n’ano
"Na Job see dɛ:"
"Wɔmma da a wɔwoo me wɔ mu no nhera
"Wɔmma da no nyɛ sum; Mma mma Nyankopɔn mmfi sor mmbisa ekyir kwan
column3: Nkyii so mma kan nnhyerɛn wɔ do."

column2: "Wɔmma sum na wu no nwinwin ngye nyɛ hɔnankasa hɔndze; Wɔmma mununkum ntsena do; Wɔmma dza ɔhyɛ adzekyee sum nyinara nyi no hu."
"Na adzesaa no dze
column3: wɔmma sum kebii nkitsa no: Mma mma ɔmmfora afrenhyia nda no mu nndzi ehurusi; Mma mma ɔmmba abosoom no dodow mu."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: wɔmma anadwe no nyɛ kɔnn; Mma mma ehurusi ndze mmba mu."

column2: "Wɔmma hɔn a wɔdom da wɔndom no
column3: Hɔn a wɔaben dɛ wopusuw dɛnkyɛmnyin no."

column2: "Wɔmma adansaber nworaba nhyɛ sum: Wɔmma ɔntweɔn kan
column3: na mma onnya bi; Nkyii so mma onnhu adzekyee n’enyisoatsɛw:"

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔanntow me na n’awotoa abow no mu
column3: Na ɔammfa awerɛhow ennhuntsa m’enyi so."

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na mennwu wɔ awotoa mu? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na menngyaa mo sunsum mu aber a mifi yafun mu firii no?"
"Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na anankoroma gyee me? Anaa ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na motoo enumfo na munumii?"
"Na nkyɛ sisei meda hɔ mayɛ komm; Nkyɛ mada; ɔnodze nkyɛ menya ahomgye:"
"Menye ahemfo na asaase do apamfo a Wɔkyekyer amamfo ma hɔnho no;"
"Anaa menye mbapɔmba a wɔwɔ sika a
column3: Wɔdze dwetɛ hyehyɛ hɔn efiefi amaama:"

column2: "Anaa metse dɛ ɔponba a wɔakora no a nkyɛ minnyi hɔ; Dɛ nkɔkowaba a wonnhun kan pɛn?"
"Hɔ na nyimpa bɔn gyaa haw; Na hɔ na hɔn a wɔaberɛ wɔhom."
"Hɔ na adaduafo nyinara hɔn ho dwe hɔn; Wɔnntse bɔmbaanyi ndze."
"Hɔ na nkakraba na akɛse wɔ; Na nkowaa dzi hɔnho fi hɔn wura nsamu."
"Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na wɔdze kan ama nyia ɔwɔ awerɛhow mu
column3: Na wɔdze nkwa ama hɔn a hɔn kra mu ayɛ wenwen;"

column2: "Hɔn a hɔn kɔn dɔ wu
column3: na ɔmmba; Na wɔbɔr hwehwɛ no kyɛn egyapadze a ohuntsa;"

column2: "Hɔn a hɔn enyi gye mbordo
"Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na wɔdze kan ama nyimpa a wɔdze no nkwa ehuntsa
column3: Na Nyankopɔn abɔ no ho ban?"

column2: "Na m’apensi abɛhyɛ m’edziban ananmu
column3: Na mo sufrɛ hue gu dɛ nsu."

column2: "Na adze a musuro aba mo do
column3: Na dza n’akoma tu wɔ ho ato me."

column2: "Minnya ahodwe
column4: nkyii so minnya ahomgye; Mbom ahoguan ara na ɔba."
